docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: List of virt-who configurations per organization

params.name: location_id
params.description: Set the current location context for the request

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Set the current organization context for the request

params.name: search
params.description: filter results

params.name: order
params.description: Sort and order by a searchable field, e.g. '<field> DESC'

params.name: page
params.description: Page number, starting at 1

params.name: per_page
params.description: Number of results per page to return, 'all' to return all results

params.name: location_id
params.description: Set the current location context for the request

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Set the current organization context for the request

params.name: id
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

apis.short_description: Renders a deploy script for the specified virt-who configuration

params.name: location_id
params.description: Set the current location context for the request

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Set the current organization context for the request

params.name: id
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: location_id
params.description: Set the current location context for the request

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Set the current organization context for the request

params.name: name
params.description: Configuration name

params.name: interval
params.description: Configuration interval in minutes

params.name: filtering_mode
params.description: Hypervisor filtering mode, 0 means no filtering, 1 means whitelist, 2 means blacklist

params.name: whitelist
params.description: Hypervisor whitelist, applicable only when filtering mode is set to 1. Wildcards and regular expressions are supported, multiple records must be separated by comma.

params.name: blacklist
params.description: Hypervisor blacklist, applicable only when filtering mode is set to 2. Wildcards and regular expressions are supported, multiple records must be separated by comma.

params.name: filter_host_parents
params.description: Applicable only for esx provider type. Only hosts which parent (usually ComputeResource) name is specified in comma-separated list in this option will be reported. Wildcards and regular expressions are supported, multiple records must be separated by comma. Put the value into the double-quotes if it contains special characters like comma. All new line characters will be removed in resulting configuration file, white spaces are removed from beginning and end.

params.name: exclude_host_parents
params.description: Applicable only for esx provider type. Hosts which parent (usually ComputeResource) name is specified in comma-separated list in this option will NOT be reported. Wildcards and regular expressions are supported, multiple records must be separated by comma. Put the value into the double-quotes if it contains special characters like comma. All new line characters will be removed in resulting configuration file, white spaces are removed from beginning and end.

params.name: hypervisor_id
params.description: Specifies how the hypervisor will be identified.

params.name: hypervisor_type
params.description: Hypervisor type

params.name: hypervisor_server
params.description: Fully qualified host name or IP address of the hypervisor

params.name: hypervisor_username
params.description: Account name by which virt-who is to connect to the hypervisor.

params.name: hypervisor_password
params.description: Hypervisor password, required for all hypervisor types except for libvirt/kubevirt.

params.name: satellite_url
params.description: Foreman server FQDN

params.name: debug
params.description: Enable debugging output

params.name: kubeconfig_path
params.description: Configuration file containing details about how to connect to the cluster and authentication details.

params.name: http_proxy_id
params.description: HTTP proxy that should be used for communication between the server on which virt-who is running and the hypervisors and virtualization managers.

params.name: no_proxy
params.description: Ignore proxy. A comma-separated list of hostnames or domains or ip addresses to ignore proxy settings for. Optionally this may be set to * to bypass proxy settings for all hostnames domains or ip addresses.

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Organization of the virt-who configuration

params.name: prism_flavor
params.description: Select the Prism flavor you are connecting to

params.name: ahv_internal_debug
params.description: Option Enable debugging output is required to enable AHV internal debug. It provides extra AHV debug information when both options are enabled

params.name: location_id
params.description: Set the current location context for the request

params.name: organization_id
params.description: Set the current organization context for the request

params.name: id
params.description: Configuration numeric identifier

params.description: Configuration name

params.description: Configuration interval in minutes
